{{Wired embedded system |brand=Planex |model=BRL-04 |revision=R |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |availability= |type=router |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8650B |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:90:CC }} {{TagLine|4 Port Ethernet Broadband Router}} :[http://web.archive.org/web/20120222204426/http://www.planex.com.tw/product/soho/router/brl-04r.htm Product page on ''PCI Taiwan''] (via archive.org) â€¢ [http://www.planex.net/spec/router/BRL-04R_Spec_Eng_v1.0.pdf Datasheet] (EN)
It is then presumed that the device is using a ''[[Realtek]]'' RTL865x SoC. :The firmware provided by ''[[Planex]]'' is a .bix file. Additional specifications, per ''Planex'''s datasheet, follow... *Dimensions (W x H x D): [[Dimensions::100 mm x 150 mm x 30 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::200 g]]
===Known security vulnerabilities=== *This device appears to be affected by the [[xmlset_roodkcableoj28840ybtide]] backdoor.
